"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "
(See Rule 7 of Customs Valuation (Determination of Value of Export Goods) Rules, 2007.)

1. Shipping Bill No.

2. Invoice No & Date:- {{ doc.name }} & {{ doc.posting_date }}

3. Nature of Transaction

Sales : ▢

Sample : ▢

Gift : ▢

Sale of Consignment Basis : ▢

Other : ▢

4. Mode of Valuation    Rule3 : ▢    Rule4 :▢   Rule5 :▢   Rule6 :▢

   (See Export Valuation Rule)

5. Whether Seller and Buyer are related

      Yes : ▢      No : ▢

6. If yes Whether relationship has influenced the price

      Yes : ▢      No : ▢

7. Terms of Payment: {{ doc.payment_terms_template or '' }}

8. Terms of Delivery: {{ doc.incoterm }} {{ doc.named_place}}

9. Previous Exports of identical / similar goods, if any

Shipping Bill No. : {{doc.shipping_bill_number or ''}}

10. Any other relevent information(Attach separate sheet, If necessary)

DECLARATION

1. I/We hereby declare that the information furnished above is true, complate and correct in every respect.

2. I.We also undertake to bring to the notice of proper officer any which subsequently come to my/our knowledge which will have bearing on a valuation.


Place: SURAT

Date : {{ doc.posting_date }}

For...........................






Director / Authorized Signatory"}]
